problem_text_cn: 如图,直尺的一条边经过一个直角顶点,直尺的另一条边与直角的一边相交,若∠1=30°,则∠2的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, one edge of the ruler passes through a vertex of a right angle, and the other edge of the ruler intersects one edge of the right angle. If ∠1 = N_0, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
raw_comment: 考查平行线的性质,解题的关键是熟练掌握平行线的性质.
